pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semiparametric Model-Assisted Estimation in Finite Population // It is a framework to fit semiparametric regression estimators for the total parameter of a finite population when the interest variable is asymmetric distributed. The main references for this package are: Sarndal C.E., Swensson B., and Wretman J. (2003,ISBN: 978-0-387-40620-6, "Model Assisted Survey Sampling." Springer-Verlag) and Cardozo C.A and Alonso C.E. (2021). "Semi-parametric model assisted estimation in finite populations." In preparation.
